name: Networkado
description:
Project Game developed during the NotGDC Game Jam 2019 (Theme: Game Conference and Events) on itch.io (https://itch.io/jam/notgdcjam2019).

How to play Talk with a lot of people and increase your professional connections. The more business cards you get, the better are your chances of getting an opportunity. Networkado is the ultimate conference simulator. Get your cards. Lock’n’load.

Controls 
- Left Arrow and Right Arrow to move
- Space to interact
- Arrow Keys to do the sequence 
- Press any key to write e-mails

Team
- Daniel Caldas as Programmer and Game Designer.
- Camila Alves as Artist.
